sentences.sCn: 那个助理接着谈了下去。

sentences.sContent: Her bravery has given him the will to carry on with his life and his work.
sentences.sCn: 她的勇气激发了他继续生活和工作下去的意愿。

sentences.sContent: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.sCn: 长子约瑟夫继承了他父亲的传统。

trans.tranOther: If you carry on doing something, you continue to do it
